markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon Handwraps](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2138)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 103 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 80,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn gloves

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These silken handwraps feature intricate embroidery of a serpentine red dragon adorned with golden thread. The handwraps function as _+3 [major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greater flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [handwraps of mighty blows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441)_. You also gain a +4 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks made to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) or [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38). When you invest the handwraps, you either increase your Strength score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever is higher.

<document level="2" id="action-1633" />

<document level="2" id="action-1634" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dragon Handwraps

The handwraps function as +3 major striking greater flaming handwraps of mighty blows . You also gain a +4 item bonus to Athletics checks made to Grapple or Shove.
